app_metadata.description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.
app_metadata.name: paperless-ngx

run_as_context.description: Redis runs as any non-root user.
Tika runs as a non-root user.
Gotenberg runs as a non-root user.

app_metadata.title: Paperless-ngx

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Paperless-ngx

attrs.label: Postgres Image (CAUTION)
attrs.description:
If you are changing this after the postgres directory has been initialized,</br>
STOP! and make sure you have a backup of your data.</br>
Changing this will trigger an one way database upgrade.</br>
You can only select newer versions of postgres.</br>
Selecting an older version will refuse to start.</br>
If something goes wrong, you will have to restore from backup.

enum.description: Postgres 15
Postgres 17

attrs.label: Database Password
attrs.description: The password for Paperless-ngx.

attrs.label: Redis Password
attrs.description: The password for Paperless-ngx.

attrs.label: Secret Key
attrs.description: The secret key for Paperless-ngx.

attrs.label: Admin User
attrs.description:
The admin user for Paperless-ngx.</br>
It is only used for the initial installation.

attrs.label: Admin Mail
attrs.description:
The admin mail for Paperless-ngx.</br>
It is only used for the initial installation.

attrs.label: Admin Password
attrs.description:
The admin password for Paperless-ngx.</br>
It is only used for the initial installation.

attrs.label: Enable Trash
attrs.description:
Enable the trash feature for Paperless-ngx.</br>
When enabled, documents will be moved to the trash instead of being deleted.

attrs.label: Enable Tika and Gotenberg
attrs.description:
Enable Tika and Gotenberg feature for Paperless-ngx.</br>
When enabled, Paperless can parse "Office" documents and E-Mails (such as ".doc", ".xlsx", ".odt" and ".eml")

attrs.label: Gotenberg Chromium Disable Javascript
attrs.description:
Disable Javascript in Chromium.</br>
When enabled, Gotenberg will not execute Javascript in Chromium.

attrs.label: Gotenberg Chromium Allow List Regex
attrs.description:
Allow List of URLs that Gotenberg will allow to be rendered.</br>
When empty, Gotenberg will allow all URLs to be rendered.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Paperless-ngx files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Paperless-ngx files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access
Expose port for inter-container communication
None

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions
attrs.description:
Automatically set permissions for the host path.
Enabling this, will check the top level directory,</br>
If it finds incorrect permissions, it will `chown` the
host path to the user and group required for the
postgres container.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a volume to a SMB share)

1.3.23.readme:
Paperless-ngx

Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.
